wsc.main.title: WSC-Connect
wsc.main.teaser: WSC-Connect connects all your favorite WSC (WoltLab® Suite Core)-Apps in one place. Receive notifications via push message and more:
wsc.main.teaser2: With WSC-Connect you access all your sites in one app. Check your notifications, conversations and the website right from the app.
wsc.main.teaser3: The dashboard on www.wsc-connect.com gives you an overview of your app and your users. Additionally you can send push messages to all of your users.
wsc.main.reason1: Multiple WSC-Apps in one native smartphone App
wsc.main.reason3: Send custom push messages from the web interface
wsc.faq.title: FAQ
wsc.faq.text1: Yes! The WSC-Connect app is free.
wsc.faq.title2: What Android version do I need and is there an iOS app?
wsc.faq.text2: You need to have at least Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean) installed on your phone. The iOS app is currently not available. As soon as we release it, there will be an announcement on wsc-connect.com.
wsc.faq.title3: Is wsc-connect.com saving sensitive user data including passwords?
wsc.faq.text3: No, we are not saving any sensitive information like passwords. Only data like the user id, the username and a randomly generated string is saved. This data is necessary to identify the user.
wsc.faq.text4: WCF version 2.0.17 or WSC version 3.0.7 is necessary to install the plugin on your website.
wsc.about.title: About
wsc.about.associated: WSC-Connect is not associated with the WoltLab® GmbH.
wsc.register.step1.title: Step 1 of 4
wsc.register.step1: Heads up! Please install the WSC-Plugin first: WSC 3.0 version or WCF 2.1 version
wsc.register.step2.title: Step 2 of 4
wsc.register.step3.title: Step 3 of 4
wsc.register.step3: Registration successful! Please go back to your ACP and save your App-ID and App-Secret.
wsc.register.step4.title: Step 4 of 4
wsc.register.step4: You are done! Your App is now active and accessible in our Android-App.
wsc.register.step4.done: Show my App in the App list
wsc.register.form.name.label: Name
wsc.register.form.name.description: Your apps name will be displayed on the front page of the app.
wsc.register.form.url.label: URL
wsc.register.form.url.description: Your apps URL will be opened as the default page.
wsc.register.form.apiUrl.label: API-URL
wsc.register.form.apiUrl.description: Your API-URL has to have a valid SSL certificate and must be accessible via https. The API-URL can be found in the ACP of your WSC installation and should look like this: https://your-domain.com/index.php?wsc-connect-api
wsc.register.form.logo.label: Logo-URL
wsc.register.form.logo.description: Your logo must be a .jpg or .png image, quadratic and should have a dimension between 200px and 500px
wsc.register.form.email.label: Email
wsc.register.form.email.description: Will be used for the login on wsc-connect.com.
wsc.register.form.apiUrl.error.https: Your API-URL must be a HTTPS-URL.
wsc.register.form.apiUrl.error.accessibl: Your API-URL is wrong or not accessible.
wsc.register.form.apiUrl.error.used: This API-URL is already in use. Login if you have already registered.
wsc.register.form.logo.error.type: Your Logo-URL must be an image.
wsc.register.form.logo.error.dimension: Your logo dimensions are not correct.
wsc.register.form.email.error: This email is already taken. Try another one.
wsc.register.form.apiSecret.error: We could not verify your App-ID and App-Secret. Please check your ACP options.
wsc.register.form.appID.description: Please copy your App-ID and save it in your WSC-Connect options in your ACP.
wsc.register.form.appID.label: App-ID
wsc.register.form.appSecret.description: Please copy your App-Secret and save it in your WSC-Connect options in your ACP. Save this key in a secure place and never give it to anyone.
wsc.register.form.appSecret.label: App-Secret
wsc.dashboard.overview.delete.error: An error occured while deleting your app. Try again.
wsc.dashboard.overview.disabled: Status: Your app is disabled. Please check your App-ID and App-Secret option in your ACP and make sure your API-URL ({apiUrl}) is accessible.
wsc.dashboard.overview.delete.modal.body:
Your App will be deleted and none of your users will receive push notifications anymore. Continue?

Do not forget to remove the WSC-Connect plugin from your WSC-App afterwards.
wsc.dashboard.messages.title: Push-Messages
wsc.dashboard.messages.table.title: Title
wsc.dashboard.messages.table.empty: You have not send any messages.
wsc.dashboard.messages.error: An error occured while sending the push message. Try again later.
wsc.dashboard.messages.empty: We could not find any users in your app to send the message to. Try again later.
wsc.dashboard.messages.submit: Send push message to ~{users, number} users
wsc.dashboard.messages.form.title.label: Title
wsc.dashboard.users.title: Users
wsc.dashboard.users.name: Name
wsc.dashboard.form.visible: Public: Your app is publicly visible. By unticking this option, your app can only be found by searching for its name in the mobile app.
wsc.apps.title: Apps
wsc.apps.name: Name
wsc.forgot.title: Forgot App-Secret
wsc.forgot.error404: We could not find the given email.
wsc.forgot.error500: An error occured, try again later.
wsc.forgot.email.subject: WSC-Connect // App-Secret
wsc.forgot.email.text:
Hello there,

your App-Secret is: [appSecret]

Regards,
Chris from WSC-Connect
wsc.forgot.form.email.description: Please type in the email you used for your registration on wsc-connect.com.
wsc.download.title: Downloads
wsc.download.android.description: Requires a smartphone with android 4.2 or higher.
wsc.download.wsc.description: Requires the WoltLab Suite in version 3.0.4 or higher.
wsc.download.wcf.description: Requires the WoltLab Community Framework in version 2.1.17 or higher.
